document_name: 3013 IAS Project Document Sri Lanka sept 2010(final).doc
Post-entry risk assessment of  Invasive Alien Flora in Sri Lanka:  Present status, gap analysis and the most troublesome alien invaders
PIMS 3013 Invasive Alien Species 2011 and 2012 PIR.xlsx
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/LKA/3013 IAS Project Document Sri Lanka sept 2010(final).doc

outputs.output_descr: The project will assist in finalising the National IAS Policy, develop the National IAS Control Act and finalise the National IAS Strategy and Action Plan through stakeholder involvement and technical assistance.

project_descr: The project will support the development of a policy and legal environment for effective control of Invasive Alien Species (IAS).
